recipes.name: Caprese Salad (Vegan)
recipes.instructions: Layer tomato slices with basil, drizzle olive oil, season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Frittata (Veg)
recipes.instructions: Mix eggs with vegetables and cheese, bake until set.

recipes.name: Margherita Pizza (Veg)
recipes.instructions: Top dough with sauce and cheese, bake until crust is golden.

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta (Non-Veg)
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta, prepare Alfredo sauce with chicken, mix together.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio (Vegan)
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta, saut√© garlic in olive oil, toss pasta with chili flakes and parsley.

recipes.name: Eggplant Parmesan (Veg)
recipes.instructions: Layer fried eggplant with sauce and cheese, bake until golden.

recipes.name: Bruschetta (Vegan)
recipes.instructions: Toast bread, top with chopped tomato, basil, and olive oil.

recipes.name: Tiramisu (Veg)
recipes.instructions: Layer coffee-soaked ladyfingers with mascarpone mixture, chill before serving.
